mapper.update:
update company
cname = #{cname,jdbcType=CHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR},
location = #{location,jdbcType=CHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT},
property = #{property,jdbcType=CHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=CHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cltime = #{cltime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update company set cname = #{cname,jdbcType=CHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=CHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, property = #{property,jdbcType=CHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=CHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cltime = #{cltime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
